statements: SELECT * FROM PestControl;
SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM PestControl;
SELECT * FROM PestControl WHERE pest_name = 'Roaches';
SELECT pest_name, recommended_practices FROM PestControl ORDER BY pest_name DESC;
SELECT id, pest_name, control_method FROM PestControl WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM PestControl WHERE id = 1;
SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM PestControl WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY pest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestControl WHERE control_method LIKE '%chemical%' AND recommended_practices IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, pest_name, recommended_practices FROM PestControl WHERE control_method = 'biological' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT pest_name, recommended_practices FROM PestControl WHERE pest_name IN ('Bed Bugs', 'Termites') ORDER BY recommended_practices
SELECT * FROM pest_control;
SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM pest_control WHERE control_method = 'Chemical';
SELECT * FROM disease_management ORDER BY disease_name DESC;
SELECT disease_name, management_method FROM disease_management WHERE prevention_method LIKE '%sanitize%';
SELECT id, pest_name, best_practice FROM pest_control WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM pest_control WHERE pest_name = 'Termites';
SELECT id, control_method FROM pest_control WHERE control_method LIKE '%chemical%';
SELECT * FROM pest_control WHERE best_practice IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM pest_control WHERE control_method = 'Biological Control' UNION SELECT disease_name, management_method FROM disease_management WHERE management_method = 'Biological Control';
SELECT id, pest_name, control_method, best_practice FROM pest_control WHERE pest_name LIKE '%rodent%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pest_control ORDER BY pest_name ASC;
SELECT id, pest_name, control_method FROM pest_control WHERE effectiveness > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM disease_management WHERE id = 1;
SELECT disease_name FROM disease_management WHERE management_strategy = 'Prevention';
SELECT id, practice_name, category FROM best_practices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_control;
SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM pest_control WHERE effectiveness > 0.8 ORDER BY pest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_management WHERE disease_name LIKE '%fungus%';
SELECT id, practice_name, category FROM best_practices WHERE category = 'Sustainability' ORDER BY practice_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM pest_control WHERE control_method = 'Chemical';
SELECT * FROM pest_management_practices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT pest_name, control_method FROM pest_management_practices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM extension_workers WHERE location = 'Farmers Market';
SELECT trainer_name, location FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT id, disease_name, prevention_measures FROM disease_management_practices ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pest_management_practices WHERE control_method LIKE '%biological%'
SELECT pest_name, recommended_products FROM pest_management_practices WHERE id < 5 ORDER BY pest_name ASC
SELECT * FROM disease_management_practices WHERE management_strategy = 'Chemical Control'
SELECT id, session_date, trainer_name FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT name, designation, location FROM extension_workers WHERE designation = 'Senior Worker' AND location IN ('City A', 'City B')
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM DiseaseManagement WHERE treatment = 'Preventive';
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM PestControlBestPractices ORDER BY pest_name ASC;
SELECT control_method, recommended_product FROM PestControlBestPractices WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM DiseaseManagement WHERE treatment LIKE '%herbal%';
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FieldActivities WHERE task = 'Irrigation' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, control_method FROM Farmers f JOIN PestControlHistory p ON f.id = p.farmer_id WHERE p.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
